item.title: Notes on Econometrics

PS4.Q2.1 Under heteroskedastiticity and/or autocorrelation of the errors, the OLS estimator is still unbiased.

item.title: Rmd Template
item.description: Words of Warning Rmd Reference Reference Cheatsheet Inline Code Executed Display Code R Code Chunk R Code (Inline) Code from Other Languages Reference Image Reference Plot Words of Warning I use Typora to write my posts. It usually processes .Rmd file correctly, but it gets lost in a file as complicated as this one. Always check twice and preview the .html page. DO NOT put spaces right after and before the \(\LaTeX\) $ $ pair or the expression will not be rendered properly.
